T02D3050:96b-0: @96b ` // khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs klu 'dul ba'i ngan thabs bzhugs so//
T02D3050:96b-3: #/ // / khro bo chen po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba nag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3050:96b-4: dang por gnas dben par mtshams bcad de /
T02D3050:96b-6: khro bo nyid mandal gyi steng du sbyan drang zhing mchod cing bstod de bsnyen pa bya /
T02D3050:96b-7: las kyi dus su bdag ni lhar bya ste /
T02D3050:96b-8: dang po stong pa nyid du bsgom /
T02D3050:96b-9: de nas yan lag bdun gyis bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag go //
T02D3050:96b-10: de nas 'byung ba rim brtsegs kyis gzhal yas khang yang gzhung bzhin du bskyed /
T02D3050:96b-11: de nas pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam /
T02D3050:96b-12: de'i thog tu mam las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam /
T02D3050:96b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su h'um 'od dang ldan pa cig bsam /
T02D3050:96b-14: 'od kyi dbus nas sdon po 'brug skad du grags 'od dang ldan pa cig bsam /
T02D3050:96b-16: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam rgyud bskul /
T02D3050:96b-17: 'gro ba sems can gyi don mdzad /
T02D3050:96b-19: aom a'a: h'um su pi tri zhes pa las /
T02D3050:96b-20: bdag nyid khro bo chen po rdo rje 'bar ba /
T02D3050:96b-21: sku mdog dbyar gyi char sprin ltar sdo nag tu gnas pa /
T02D3050:96b-22: khro gnyer rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin gtsigs pa /
T02D3050:96b-24: spyan gser btso ma ltar dmar ser /
T02D3050:96b-25: smin ma dmar po gyen du bskyod pa /
T02D3050:96b-26: mchu sder rdo rje gnam lcags las byas pa /
T02D3050:96b-27: 'dab gshog nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa /
T02D3050:96b-30: dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3050:96b-31: sbrul gyis rked chings byas pa /
T02D3050:96b-33: g-yang gzhi rlon ba stod la gsol ba /
T02D3050:96b-34: stag gi g-yang gzhis sham thabs byas pa /
T02D3050:96b-35: klu'i rgyal po gzi can thod du byas pa /
T02D3050:96b-36: klu'i rgyal po taksha ka rked chings byas pa /
T02D3050:96b-37: klu'i rgyal po sog ma med gdan khrir byas pa zhabs kyis gzir ba /
T02D3050:96b-38: yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3050:96b-39: phyag dang po gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D3050:96b-40: bar ma gnyis g-yas ral gri g-yon seng ldeng gi phur bu bsnams pa /
T02D3050:96b-41: g-yas tha ma na gnam lcags kyi tho ba /
T02D3050:96b-42: g-yon lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D3050:97a-0: rdo rje gnam lcags kyi phreng ba se ral khar @97a * //
T02D3050:97a-2: thod pa skom rlon gyi phreng bas do shal byas pa /
T02D3050:97a-3: me'i se rab phab nas klu'i gnas bsregs pa /
T02D3050:97a-4: sku las ye shes kyi me 'bar ba /
T02D3050:97a-5: sbrin nag 'khyil pa'i nang na bzhugs pa cig tu bdag bsgom mo //
T02D3050:97a-6: de ye shes lngas dbang bskur /
T02D3050:97a-7: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab po //
T02D3050:97a-8: de nas rdo rje sna nan bya ba ni bdag bskyed pa'o //
T02D3050:97a-9: de nas gzhan bskyed pa ni mdun du pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D3050:97a-10: de'i steng du mam las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D3050:97a-11: steng du h'um sngon po las dam tshig sems dpa'
T02D3050:97a-12: bskyed de // de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang /
T02D3050:97a-13: aom su pi tri badzra dunti ma h'a kro dha /
T02D3050:97a-14: manda la ma h'a te a'a be sha ya aa a'a /
T02D3050:97a-16: de nas phyi nang gi mchod pa sngags kyis dbul lo //
T02D3050:97a-17: de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la khro bo la dbul lo //
T02D3050:97a-18: aom su bi tri badzra dunte ma h'a kro dha ba lim bhunydza /
T02D3050:97a-20: kh'a hi kh'a hi sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3050:97a-21: de nas bstod bas bstod do //
T02D3050:97a-22: h'um me dpung sprin nag 'khyil pa'i klong dkyil nas //
T02D3050:97a-23: klu rgyal sog med 'khyil pa'i gdan stengs nas //
T02D3050:97a-24: khro rgyal rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba ni //
T02D3050:97a-25: zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can //
T02D3050:97a-26: rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
T02D3050:97a-27: rdo rje sder tshe na gdengs pa ni /
T02D3050:97a-28: gdug pa'i klu rgyal snying 'dar cod pa nas la 'brul //
T02D3050:97a-29: h'um dang phat kyi gad rgyangs drag po yis //
T02D3050:97a-30: klu gdon gdug pa'i snying 'dar mgo bo 'gas //
T02D3050:97a-31: kha sbub bskyel te khrag sgyugs gas nas 'chi //
T02D3050:97a-32: rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mchu ba dar nas //
T02D3050:97a-33: klu gdon gdrug pa'i snying khrag khong nas 'jib //
T02D3050:97a-34: ral ba kham nag gyen du g-yengs nas kyang //
T02D3050:97a-35: me yi ser bas klu yi pho brang 'joms //
T02D3050:97a-36: gshog pa gser gyi sbu gri brdabs nas kyang //
T02D3050:97a-37: rgya mtsho gshags nas klu rnams dum bur gtubs //
T02D3050:97a-38: sgro 'dab rdo rje lcags kyu 'bar ba yis //
T02D3050:97a-39: gdug pa'i klu rnams ma lus snying nas 'dren //
T02D3050:97a-40: g-yas kyi phyag rgyas byugs pa yis //
T02D3050:97a-41: lha chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas //
T02D3050:97a-42: bandha thogs pas dbu la brgyan //
T02D3050:97a-43: g-yon gyi phyag rgyas byugs pa yis //
T02D3050:97a-44: klu chen brgyad kyi snying phyung nas //
T02D3050:97a-45: rus sbal khog pa bkang nas gsol //
T02D3050:97b-0: g-yas kyi shes rab @97b ral gri yis //
T02D3050:97b-1: klu rnams ma lus gtub par mdzad //
T02D3050:97b-2: g-yon pa seng ldeng phur bu yis //
T02D3050:97b-3: klu rnams ma lus rtsad nas gcod //
T02D3050:97b-4: g-yas na gnam lcags tho ba yis //
T02D3050:97b-5: sa bdag pho mo rdul du rlog / g-yon pa lcags kyu zhags pa yis //
T02D3050:97b-7: / rdo rje 'bar ba'i ba sbu nas //
T02D3050:97b-8: mkha' lding mtshon cha'i char bab nas //
T02D3050:97b-9: gdug pa'i klu rnams brlag par mdzad //
T02D3050:97b-10: sku stod zhing chen g-yang gzhi gsol nas kyang //
T02D3050:97b-11: srid pa'i ma tshogs 'dar zhing sdud //
T02D3050:97b-12: sku smad stag gi sham thabs gsol nas kyang //
T02D3050:97b-13: gdug pa'i klu la stag ltar mchong bar byed //
T02D3050:97b-14: phyag na rdo rje thugs kyi sbrul pa'i sku //
T02D3050:97b-15: khro chen 'bar ba che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3050:97b-16: bde gshegs gtum po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3050:97b-17: bcom ldan klu gdug 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3050:97b-18: aom su bi tri badzra dunta ma h'a kro dha mi li mi li h'um phat /
T02D3050:97b-22: // / sgrub pa'i dus su phyag rgya dang po gnyis klu'i gnya' ba dang mkhrig ma nas bzung ste /
T02D3050:97b-23: mchu snying gar btsugs te khrag 'jib par bsam mo //
T02D3050:97b-24: klu gzir zhing bskrad de tshar bcad pa ni /
T02D3050:97b-25: rabs chad kyi thod pa'am lcags snod du /
T02D3050:97b-26: bag zan las kla'i gzugs sna tshogs byas /
T02D3050:97b-27: yungs kar dang mtshon bdar ba'i phye ma dang /
T02D3050:97b-28: bdug pa'i rdzas sna tshogs dang /
T02D3050:97b-29: sngags phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pas tshig cing skad ngan thon te bros so //
T02D3050:97b-30: phyag rgya ni mthe bong gnyis sbrel te nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa bzhin du byas te /
T02D3050:97b-31: aom tram sdum khrom h'um phat /
T02D3050:97b-32: de yis rgya mtsho gshegs nas klu gton te lcags
T02D3050:97b-33: kyu bsgril ma'i phyag rgya byas te h'um n'a gi
T02D3050:97b-34: h'um dza / gnya' ba nas bzung nas 'ongs par bsam /
T02D3050:97b-35: aom badzra pa ti ga ru da h'um h'um dza: dza: ra tsi sri dza h'um phat /
T02D3050:97b-36: phyag rgya ni mthe bong gnyis rtse sprad de bsgrengs /
T02D3050:97b-37: mdzub mo gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud ;
T02D3050:97b-38: srin lag gnyis nang du bskum /
T02D3050:97b-39: mthe chung gnyis thad kar brkyang ste /
T02D3050:97b-40: dpral ba'i thad kar phyag rgya byas te /
T02D3050:97b-41: mtshog ma'i thad kar lan gsum bskor te dgrol bas
T02D3050:97b-42: de nyid du nam mkha' la sbrin nag po dang
T02D3050:97b-43: sngon po 'khrigs shing mtshon cha'i tshub ma phyogs kun
T02D3050:98a-2: mi bzod nas cho nges 'debs shing /
T02D3050:98a-3: aa la la khro bo'i rgyal po ci bsgo ba
T02D3050:98a-4: nyan no zer nas skyabs su song bar bsam mo
T02D3050:98a-6: aom bi phu le pra ba re n'a ge ma
T02D3050:98a-7: h'a n'a ga hri da ya aa brte dzva la
T02D3050:98a-8: dzva la / sarba n'a ga hri da ya ne /
T02D3050:98a-10: n'a ga gu la bi dhvansa ni /
T02D3050:98a-12: sarba n'a ga hri da ya ni /
T02D3050:98a-14: sarba dushta n'a ga bha ba na ni /
T02D3050:98a-15: pa tsa ya pa tsa ya /
T02D3050:98a-16: sarba dusht'a na n'a g'a n'a na /
T02D3050:98a-17: aa kra ma aa kra ma /
T02D3050:98a-19: sa ga ra bi ma le /
T02D3050:98a-20: bi tra me ma h'a n'a ga te dza ba re sv'a h'a /
T02D3050:98a-21: de nas klu sgrag par bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-24: // / gnyen klu rigs dang gdon phal pa la /
T02D3050:98a-25: glang ru rta rkang dang nya mgo bya rtug dang /
T02D3050:98a-26: sgra shad dang gu gul nag po dang sbyar la bdug par bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-27: aom badzra tishtha badzra h'um phat /
T02D3050:98a-28: seng ldeng dang lcags kyi phur bul sum 'bum bzlas te snying gar gdab par bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-31: tsandra tsandri batta ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3050:98a-33: yungs kar dang til dang ske tshe dang tshon phye dang bye ma la sum 'bum bzlas te /
T02D3050:98a-34: brab cing gzir ba dang tshar gcad par bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-35: man 'a bsgags te phyis mi ldang bar bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-37: aom dza ta dza na n'a ga bi dza tishtha tishtha sa tsa ra si ti sv'a h'a /
T02D3050:98a-38: de lta bu ni gsad las thams cad la bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-39: 'byung po bskrad cing gsad par 'dod na /
T02D3050:98a-40: lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug par bya /
T02D3050:98a-41: bdag gi dza'i 'od zer gyis klu'i khong du bstim par bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-42: khod du thim pa'i dza'i 'od zer smug nag tu gyur pas /
T02D3050:98a-43: klu la me 'bar te klu dang bsdongs pa'i 'byung
T02D3050:98a-44: po rnams kyang 'thab cing skad 'byung ste 'bros par
T02D3050:98a-45: 'gyur ro // ma h'a ru dra ru dra tha h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3050:98a-46: phyag rgya ni sor mo nang du bskum ste gung
T02D3050:98a-47: mo ga nyis rtse sbrad de bkug ste rgyag par
T02D3050:98a-48: bya'o // gang zhig klus gzir ba la stag gi mche ba dang /
T02D3050:98a-49: mtshon bdar ba'i phye ma dang /
T02D3050:98a-50: glang rong nag po'i chu nang du bskol lo //
T02D3050:98a-51: gar na bar bsku bar bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-52: rdo rje 'bar pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-53: yang na khyi'i gcin la bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-56: // / klu la mchod pa bya zhing dug dbyung ba ni /
T02D3050:98a-58: klu'i gzugs kyis dgod par bya'o //
T02D3050:98a-59: de bzhin klu sman mtshon pa bsag / de nas klu rnams sbyan drangs la //
T02D3050:98b-0: dkar gsum @98b mngar gsum mchod pa 'bul /
T02D3050:98b-1: aom badzra p'a ni bya ba sarba bitta n'a ga r'a dza sum bha ni h'um /
T02D3050:98b-2: rgyal sras thugs rje'i mchog mnga' ba'i //
T02D3050:98b-3: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba dang //
T02D3050:98b-4: mtho ris thar ba bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D3050:98b-5: gsang sngags dam las ma 'da' zhig / khyod kyi sems las 'das gyur te //
T02D3050:98b-6: byang chub bde ba bskyed pa dang //
T02D3050:98b-7: nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi ba'i phyir //
T02D3050:98b-8: khyod la rab tu skrag par bya //
T02D3050:98b-9: thams cad bde ba'i sa bon te //
T02D3050:98b-10: bde ba thams cad 'grub pa yin //
T02D3050:98b-12: 'chi bdag gi ni gsal shing ltar //
T02D3050:98b-13: rdo rje'i mtshon cha rnon po yis //
T02D3050:98b-14: khyod kyi yan lag gcod par 'gyur //
T02D3050:98b-15: aom sva ta badzra h'um ka ra dra ba dra
T02D3050:98b-16: ba bi dr'a ba pi ya na shan na ha
T02D3050:98b-17: na h'um phat / sngags des klu'i sems kyi dkyil
T02D3050:98b-18: 'khor la 'khor bar sgong gis song bar bsam mo
T02D3050:98b-19: na h'um phat / // sngags des klu'i sems la yod pa'i sgrib pa byang nas /
T02D3050:98b-20: chos thos pa'i sems byang chub tu brtan par gyur nas ;
T02D3050:98b-21: sngon phyag na rdo rje'i bka' rjes su dran nas /
T02D3050:98b-22: slob dpon yin snyam nas tshur mi gnod par stong grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3050:98b-23: ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur ro //
T02D3050:98b-26: // / de bzhin du char dbab par 'dod na /
T02D3050:98b-27: klu sgrub pa dang mchod pa gzhung bzhin byas /
T02D3050:98b-29: klu yi gzugs kyis dgod par bya //
T02D3050:98b-30: dbus su khro bo de nyid bsgom //
T02D3050:98b-31: 'khor gyi klu rnams mchod cing bstod //
T02D3050:98b-33: de yis phebs par ma gyur na //
T02D3050:98b-34: thod pa shin tu dkar pa la //
T02D3050:98b-35: sog med bskyed la gzir bar bya //
T02D3050:98b-36: lcags sam rabs chad thod pa ru //
T02D3050:98b-37: klu gzugs brubs te bdug cing gzir //
T02D3050:98b-41: // / ser ba la thal chen dang dug dang yungs kar dang sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal bas bya'o //
T02D3050:98b-44: // / dgra la chu skol gyis bya'o //
T02D3050:98b-49: gzhan bsrung ba ni skud pa dang sngags dang rdzas kyis bya'o //
T02D3050:98b-52: // / n'a ga tsitta rakta pi pa dos ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3050:98b-54: aom n'a ga ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02D3050:98b-55: n'a ga da ha da ha h'um phat /
